statements: SELECT response_id, survey_id, feedback FROM survey_responses WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 5 ORDER BY response_id DESC
SELECT feedback, review FROM survey_responses WHERE event_id = 3 LIMIT 10
SELECT survey_id, response_id, feedback FROM survey_responses WHERE event_id = 2 ORDER BY response_id ASC
SELECT review, survey_id, event_id FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 3
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 10 AND event_id = 100;
SELECT response_id, feedback FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 20 AND event_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 30 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 40 ORDER BY review ASC, event_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, feedback, review FROM survey_responses WHERE event_id IN (500, 600);
SELECT * FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback
SELECT event_name, feedback_rating FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3
SELECT event_name, feedback_comments FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback ORDER BY event_name DESC
SELECT feedback_rating, event_name, feedback_comments FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE event_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Survey_Responses
SELECT * FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY event_name DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name, feedback_rating FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE event_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE feedback_comments LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT event_name, feedback_rating FROM Monitor_Event_Feedback WHERE feedback_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating ASC
SELECT respondent_name, survey_date FROM Survey_Responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT event_id, feedback_rating FROM EventFeedback WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_comments FROM EventFeedback WHERE event_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND participant_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT response FROM SurveyResponses WHERE participant_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sentiment_score, keyword_analysis FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE review_id = '523e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_comments, feedback_rating FROM EventFeedback WHERE event_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-56789abcdef1' ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, keyword_analysis -> 'positive' AS positive_keywords FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE review_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-12ab-cdefabcdef12';
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, event_id, rating, comments FROM EventFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM MonitorEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM Reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT event_id, user_id, rating FROM EventFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_feedbacks FROM EventFeedback GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01' AND response_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_name, location, organizer FROM MonitorEvents WHERE event_date < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT event_id, participant_name, rating FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email, phone_number FROM Participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, location, organizer FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email, phone_number FROM Participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY participant_name;
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM Events INNER JOIN Ratings ON Events.event_id = Ratings.event_id ORDER BY event_name, organizer;
SELECT AVG(rating_value) as average_rating, COUNT(*) as total_ratings FROM Ratings GROUP BY event_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
